name: Event Invitation Poster With 1 Click
description: Designing a professional and eye-catching flyer to promote your event.

nodes.name: generate_image
nodes.title: Generate Image
nodes.description: Use AI to generate images from your imagination. Simply describe what you want to see, and watch the AI bring it to life.

input_config.prompt: Design an event flyer for [event name/description] {{name}} {{brief}} that contains [event details/dates/location/etc.] {{date_time}} {{location}} and is visually appealing with brand colors{{brand_colors}}

brief.title: Event Description (Brief)
brief.description: A concise overview of the event's purpose and key highlights.

ui_metadata.value: Join us for a day of gaming fun! Play the latest releases, meet developers, and compete in exciting tournaments.

location.title: Event Location (Optional)
location.description: The physical location or online platform where the event will be held (if applicable).

date_time.title: Event Date & Time
date_time.description: The date and time your event will take place.

brand_colors.title: Brand Colors
brand_colors.description: If you have branding guidelines, include your logo and color scheme for a consistent look.
